Distribution.definition: the act or process of distributing

1.definition: the act or process of distributing

sub_terms.a: the apportionment by a court of the property and esp. personal property of an intestate among those entitled to it according to statute compare,
sub_terms.b: the payment or transfer to a beneficiary of interest to which he or she is entitled under a trust
sub_terms.c: the transfer by a corporation or mutual fund of money or property to a shareholder in his or her capacity as a shareholder
sub_terms.d: the initial offering to the public of a security by a corporation
sub_terms.e: the delivery of a controlled substance

1.note: The laws dealing with intestate succession are often called laws of descent and distribution.
